name: Nyanco Impact
description:
Hello, world! Was that a cat I saw? In this game, pre-generated AI artwork will be randomly loaded to help you find your own favorite nekomimi girl variant of Nyanco. You can randomly discover your own ideal cat girl in this game. Find out what serendipity awaits you!

Features：

  • You can give her a custom name.
  • You can save your best moments with her.
  • You can input customizable text prompts to her.
  • AI will do work, as long as your support continues.
  • AI will find your ideal cat girl until you are satisfied.

Special Thanks :

Alice, Holy Lightning, nashix, kuroyuki27, 腌笃鲜, and the player!

Disclaimer :

  • This game supports some user customization for AI artwork.
  • We do not take any responsibility for user-created things.
